tags.name: igc-avatar
tags.description:
An avatar component is used as a representation of a user identity
typically in a user profile.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: The image source to use.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Alternative text for the image.

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: Initials to use as a fallback when no image is available.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: The shape of the avatar.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: src
properties.description: The image source to use.

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Alternative text for the image.

properties.name: initials
properties.description: Initials to use as a fallback when no image is available.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: The shape of the avatar.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

slots.description: Renders an icon inside the default slot.

cssParts.name: base
cssParts.description: The base wrapper of the avatar.

cssParts.name: initials
cssParts.description: The initials wrapper of the avatar.

cssParts.name: image
cssParts.description: The image wrapper of the avatar.

cssParts.name: icon
cssParts.description: The icon wrapper of the avatar.

tags.name: igc-badge
tags.description:
The badge is a component indicating a status on a related item or an area
where some active indication is required.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The type of badge.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: Sets whether to draw an outlined version of the badge.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: The shape of the badge.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: The type of badge.

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Sets whether to draw an outlined version of the badge.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: The shape of the badge.

cssParts.name: base
cssParts.description: The base wrapper of the badge.

tags.name: igc-button
tags.description:
Represents a clickable button, used to submit forms or anywhere in a
document for accessible, standard button functionality.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Sets the variant of the button.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the button. Defaults to undefined.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: The URL the button points to.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: Prompts to save the linked URL instead of navigating to it.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description:
The relationship of the linked URL.
See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Determines whether the button is disabled.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Sets the variant of the button.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the button. Defaults to undefined.

properties.name: href
properties.description: The URL the button points to.

properties.name: download
properties.description: Prompts to save the linked URL instead of navigating to it.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context.

properties.name: rel
properties.description:
The relationship of the linked URL.
See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Determines whether the button is disabled.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

events.name: igcFocus
events.description: Emitted when the button gains focus.

events.name: igcBlur
events.description: Emitted when the button loses focus.

slots.description: Renders the label of the button.

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Renders content before the label of the button.

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Renders content after the label of the button.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The visual variant of the icon button.

attributes.description: The type of the button. Defaults to undefined.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: The URL the button points to.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: Prompts to save the linked URL instead of navigating to it.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description:
The relationship of the linked URL.
See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Determines whether the button is disabled.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

tags.name: igc-calendar
tags.description:
Represents a calendar that lets users
to select a date value in a variety of different ways.

attributes.name: hide-outside-days
attributes.description: Controls the visibility of the dates that do not belong to the current month.

attributes.name: hide-header
attributes.description: Determines whether the calendar hides its header. Even if set to false, the header is not displayed for `multiple` selection.

attributes.name: header-orientation
attributes.description: The orientation of the header.

attributes.name: orientation
attributes.description: The orientation of the multiple months displayed in days view.

attributes.name: visible-months
attributes.description: The number of months displayed in days view.

attributes.name: active-view
attributes.description: The active view.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Тhe current value of the calendar.
Used when selection is set to single.

attributes.name: values
attributes.description:
Тhe current values of the calendar.
Used when selection is set to multiple or range.

attributes.name: selection
attributes.description: Sets the type of date selection.

attributes.name: show-week-numbers
attributes.description: Show/hide the week numbers.

attributes.name: week-start
attributes.description: Sets the start day of the week.

attributes.name: active-date
attributes.description: Sets the date which is shown in view and is highlighted. By default it is the current date.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Sets the locale used for formatting and displaying the dates in the calendar.

properties.name: hideOutsideDays
properties.description: Controls the visibility of the dates that do not belong to the current month.

properties.name: hideHeader
properties.description: Determines whether the calendar hides its header. Even if set to false, the header is not displayed for `multiple` selection.

properties.name: headerOrientation
properties.description: The orientation of the header.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of the multiple months displayed in days view.

properties.name: visibleMonths
properties.description: The number of months displayed in days view.

properties.name: activeView
properties.description: The active view.

properties.name: formatOptions
properties.description: The options used to format the months and the weekdays in the calendar views.

properties.name: resourceStrings
properties.description: The resource strings.
properties.default: {"selectMonth":"Select month","selectYear":"Select year","selectDate":"Select date","selectRange":"Select range","selectedDate":"Selected date","startDate":"Start","endDate":"End","previousMonth":"Previous month","nextMonth":"Next month","previousYear":"Previous year","nextYear":"Next year","previousYears":"Previous {0} years","nextYears":"Next {0} years","weekLabel":"Wk"}

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: value
properties.description:
Тhe current value of the calendar.
Used when selection is set to single.

properties.name: values
properties.description:
Тhe current values of the calendar.
Used when selection is set to multiple or range.

properties.name: selection
properties.description: Sets the type of date selection.

properties.name: showWeekNumbers
properties.description: Show/hide the week numbers.

properties.name: weekStart
properties.description: Sets the start day of the week.

properties.name: activeDate
properties.description: Sets the date which is shown in view and is highlighted. By default it is the current date.

properties.name: locale
properties.description: Sets the locale used for formatting and displaying the dates in the calendar.

properties.name: disabledDates
properties.description: Gets/sets disabled dates.

properties.name: specialDates
properties.description: Gets/sets special dates.

events.name: igcChange
events.description: Emitted when calendar changes its value.

slots.description: The default slot for the calendar.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Renders the title of the calendar header.

tags.name: igc-days-view

attributes.name: hide-trailing-days

attributes.description: The format of the days. Defaults to narrow.

tags.name: igc-chip
tags.description: Chips help people enter information, make selections, filter content, or trigger actions.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state for the chip.

attributes.name: removable
attributes.description: Defines if the chip is removable or not.

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: Defines if the chip is selectable or not.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Defines if the chip is selected or not.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: A property that sets the color variant of the chip component.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Sets the disabled state for the chip.

properties.name: removable
properties.description: Defines if the chip is removable or not.

properties.name: selectable
properties.description: Defines if the chip is selectable or not.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Defines if the chip is selected or not.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: A property that sets the color variant of the chip component.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

events.name: igcRemove
events.description: Emits an event when the chip component is removed. Returns the removed chip component.

events.name: igcSelect
events.description: Emits event when the chip component is selected/deselected and any related animations and transitions also end.

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Renders content before the data of the chip.

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Renders content after the data of the chip.

cssParts.name: prefix

cssParts.name: suffix

properties.name: items
properties.description: All child `igc-dropdown-item`s.

slots.description: Intended to contain the items belonging to this group.

tags.name: igc-dropdown-item
tags.description: Represents an item in a dropdown list.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Тhe current value of the item.
If not specified, the element's text content is used.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Determines whether the item is selected.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Determines whether the item is active.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Determines whether the item is disabled.

properties.name: value
properties.description:
Тhe current value of the item.
If not specified, the element's text content is used.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Determines whether the item is selected.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Determines whether the item is active.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Determines whether the item is disabled.

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Renders content before the item's main content.

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Renders content after the item's main content.

tags.name: igc-dropdown
tags.description: Represents a DropDown component.

attributes.name: keep-open-on-select
attributes.description: Whether the dropdown should be kept open on selection.

attributes.name: scroll-strategy
attributes.description: Determines the behavior of the component during scrolling the container.

attributes.name: keep-open-on-outside-click
attributes.description: Whether the component should be kept open on clicking outside of it.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Sets the open state of the component.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: The preferred placement of the component around the target element.

attributes.name: position-strategy
attributes.description: Sets the component's positioning strategy.

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description:
Whether the component should be flipped to the opposite side of the target once it's about to overflow the visible area.
When true, once enough space is detected on its preferred side, it will flip back.

attributes.name: distance
attributes.description: The distance from the target element.

attributes.name: same-width
attributes.description: Whether the dropdown's width should be the same as the target's one.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: keepOpenOnSelect
properties.description: Whether the dropdown should be kept open on selection.

properties.name: scrollStrategy
properties.description: Determines the behavior of the component during scrolling the container.

properties.name: keepOpenOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Whether the component should be kept open on clicking outside of it.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Sets the open state of the component.

properties.name: placement
properties.description: The preferred placement of the component around the target element.

properties.name: positionStrategy
properties.description: Sets the component's positioning strategy.

properties.name: flip
properties.description:
Whether the component should be flipped to the opposite side of the target once it's about to overflow the visible area.
When true, once enough space is detected on its preferred side, it will flip back.

properties.name: distance
properties.description: The distance from the target element.

properties.name: sameWidth
properties.description: Whether the dropdown's width should be the same as the target's one.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

events.name: igcChange
events.description: Emitted when the selected item changes.

events.name: igcOpening
events.description: Emitted just before the dropdown is open.

events.name: igcOpened
events.description: Emitted after the dropdown is open.

events.name: igcClosing
events.description: Emitter just before the dropdown is closed.

events.name: igcClosed
events.description: Emitted after closing the dropdown.

tags.name: igc-expansion-panel
tags.description:
The Expansion Panel Component provides a way to display information in a toggleable way -
compact summary view containing title and description and expanded detail view containing
additional content to the summary header.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Indicates whether the contents of the control should be visible.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Get/Set whether the expansion panel is disabled. Disabled panels are ignored for user interactions.

attributes.name: indicator-position
attributes.description: The indicator position of the expansion panel.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Indicates whether the contents of the control should be visible.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Get/Set whether the expansion panel is disabled. Disabled panels are ignored for user interactions.

properties.name: indicatorPosition
properties.description: The indicator position of the expansion panel.

events.name: igcOpening
events.description: Emitted before opening the expansion panel.

events.name: igcOpened
events.description: Emitted after the expansion panel is opened.

events.name: igcClosing
events.description: Emitted before closing the expansion panel.

events.name: igcClosed
events.description: Emitted after the expansion panel is closed.

slots.name: title
slots.description: renders the title of the panel's header

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: renders the subtitle of the panel's header

cssParts.name: header
cssParts.description: The container of the expansion indicator, title and subtitle.

tags.name: igc-mask-input
tags.description:
A masked input is an input field where a developer can control user input and format the visible value,
based on configurable rules

attributes.name: dir
attributes.description: The direction attribute of the control.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: Controls the validity of the control.

attributes.name: value-mode
attributes.description:
Dictates the behavior when retrieving the value of the control:

- `raw` will return the clean user input.
- `withFormatting` will return the value with all literals and prompts.

attributes.name: mask
attributes.description: The mask pattern to apply on the input.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.description: The prompt symbol to use for unfilled parts of the mask.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
The value of the input.

Regardless of the currently set `value-mode`, an empty value will return an empty string.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name attribute of the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Makes the control a required field.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Makes the control a disabled field.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Makes the control a readonly field.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The placeholder attribute of the control.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the control.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

- `withFormatting` will return the value with all literals and prompts.

properties.name: prompt

tags.name: igc-circular-gradient
tags.description:
Used for defining gradient stops in the igc-circular-progress.
For each `igc-circular-gradient` defined as `gradient` slot of `igc-circular-progress` element would be created a SVG stop element.
The values passed as `color`, `offset` and `opacity` would be set as
`stop-color`, `offset` and `stop-opacity` of the SVG element without further validations.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: Defines where the gradient stop is placed along the gradient vector

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the gradient stop

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description: Defines the opacity of the gradient stop

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Defines where the gradient stop is placed along the gradient vector

properties.name: color
properties.description: Defines the color of the gradient stop

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Defines the opacity of the gradient stop

tags.name: igc-circular-progress
tags.description:
A circular progress indicator used to express unspecified wait time or display
the length of a process.

attributes.name: hide-label
attributes.description: Shows/hides the label of the control.

attributes.name: label-format
attributes.description:
Format string for the default label of the control.
Placeholders:
 {0} - current value of the control.
 {1} - max value of the control.

properties.description:
Format string for the default label of the control.
Placeholders:
 {0} - current value of the control.
 {1} - max value of the control.

slots.name: gradient
slots.description: Customize the progress bar in order to use a color gradient instead of a solid color. Accepts `igc-circular-gradient` elements.

tags.name: igc-rating-symbol

tags.name: igc-rating
tags.description:
Rating provides insight regarding others' opinions and experiences,
and can allow the user to submit a rating of their own

attributes.description: The maximum value for the rating

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: The minimum value change allowed.

attributes.name: symbol
attributes.description: The symbol which the rating will display.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name attribute of the control

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label of the control.

attributes.name: value-format
attributes.description:
A format string which sets aria-valuetext. All instances of '{0}' will be replaced
with the current value of the control.
Important for screen-readers and useful for localization.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current value of the component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the component

attributes.name: hover-preview
attributes.description: Sets hover preview behavior for the component

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Sets the readonly state of the component

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.description: The maximum value for the rating

properties.name: step

tags.name: igc-ripple
tags.description:
A ripple can be applied to an element to represent
interactive surface.

tags.name: igc-range-slider
tags.description: A range slider component used to select two numeric values within a range.

attributes.name: lower
attributes.description: The current value of the lower thumb.

attributes.name: upper
attributes.description: The current value of the upper thumb.

attributes.name: aria-label-lower
attributes.description: The aria label of the lower thumb.

attributes.name: aria-label-upper
attributes.description: The aria label of the upper thumb.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The minimum value of the slider scale. Defaults to 0.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum value of the slider scale. Defaults to 100.

attributes.name: lower-bound
attributes.description: The lower bound of the slider value. If not set, the `min` value is applied.

attributes.name: upper-bound
attributes.description: The upper bound of the slider value. If not set, the `max` value is applied.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the UI interactions of the slider.

attributes.name: discrete-track
attributes.description:
Marks the slider track as discrete so it displays the steps.
If the `step` is 0, the slider will remain continuos even if `discreteTrack` is `true`.

attributes.name: hide-tooltip
attributes.description: Hides the thumb tooltip.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description:
Specifies the granularity that the value must adhere to.
If set to 0 no stepping is implied and any value in the range is allowed.

attributes.name: primary-ticks
attributes.description: The number of primary ticks. It defaults to 0 which means no primary ticks are displayed.

attributes.name: secondary-ticks
attributes.description: The number of secondary ticks. It defaults to 0 which means no secondary ticks are displayed.

attributes.name: tick-orientation
attributes.description: Changes the orientation of the ticks.

attributes.name: hide-primary-labels
attributes.description: Hides the primary tick labels.

attributes.name: hide-secondary-labels
attributes.description: Hides the secondary tick labels.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: The locale used to format the thumb and tick label values in the slider.

attributes.name: value-format
attributes.description: String format used for the thumb and tick label values in the slider.

attributes.name: tick-label-rotation
attributes.description: The degrees for the rotation of the tick labels. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: lower
properties.description: The current value of the lower thumb.

properties.name: upper
properties.description: The current value of the upper thumb.

properties.name: ariaLabelLower
properties.description: The aria label of the lower thumb.

properties.name: ariaLabelUpper
properties.description: The aria label of the upper thumb.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the slider scale. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the slider scale. Defaults to 100.

properties.name: lowerBound
properties.description: The lower bound of the slider value. If not set, the `min` value is applied.

properties.name: upperBound
properties.description: The upper bound of the slider value. If not set, the `max` value is applied.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables the UI interactions of the slider.

properties.name: discreteTrack
properties.description:
Marks the slider track as discrete so it displays the steps.
If the `step` is 0, the slider will remain continuos even if `discreteTrack` is `true`.

properties.name: hideTooltip
properties.description: Hides the thumb tooltip.

properties.name: step
properties.description:
Specifies the granularity that the value must adhere to.
If set to 0 no stepping is implied and any value in the range is allowed.

properties.name: primaryTicks
properties.description: The number of primary ticks. It defaults to 0 which means no primary ticks are displayed.

properties.name: secondaryTicks
properties.description: The number of secondary ticks. It defaults to 0 which means no secondary ticks are displayed.

properties.name: tickOrientation
properties.description: Changes the orientation of the ticks.

properties.name: hidePrimaryLabels
properties.description: Hides the primary tick labels.

properties.name: hideSecondaryLabels
properties.description: Hides the secondary tick labels.

properties.name: locale
properties.description: The locale used to format the thumb and tick label values in the slider.

properties.name: valueFormat
properties.description: String format used for the thumb and tick label values in the slider.

properties.name: valueFormatOptions
properties.description: Number format options used for the thumb and tick label values in the slider.

properties.name: tickLabelRotation
properties.description: The degrees for the rotation of the tick labels. Defaults to 0.

events.name: igcInput
events.description: Emitted when a value is changed via thumb drag or keyboard interaction.

events.name: igcChange
events.description: Emitted when a value change is committed on a thumb drag end or keyboard interaction.

cssParts.name: base
cssParts.description: The base wrapper of the slider.

cssParts.name: tick-label-inner
cssParts.description: The inner element of the tick label.

cssParts.name: thumb-label-inner
cssParts.description: The thumb tooltip label inner element.

cssParts.name: inactive
cssParts.description: The inactive element of the track.

cssParts.name: fill
cssParts.description: The filled part of the track.

tags.name: igc-snackbar
tags.description:
A snackbar component is used to provide feedback about an operation
by showing a brief message at the bottom of the screen.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Determines whether the snackbar is opened.

attributes.name: display-time
attributes.description: Determines the duration in ms in which the snackbar will be visible.

attributes.name: keep-open
attributes.description: Determines whether the snackbar should close after the displayTime is over.

attributes.name: action-text
attributes.description: The snackbar action button.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Determines whether the snackbar is opened.

properties.name: displayTime
properties.description: Determines the duration in ms in which the snackbar will be visible.

properties.name: keepOpen
properties.description: Determines whether the snackbar should close after the displayTime is over.

properties.name: actionText
properties.description: The snackbar action button.

events.name: igcAction
events.description: Emitted when the snackbar action button is clicked.

cssParts.name: base
cssParts.description: The base wrapper of the snackbar component.

tags.name: igc-toast
tags.description: A toast component is used to show a notification

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Determines whether the toast is opened.

attributes.name: display-time
attributes.description: Determines the time after which the toast will close

attributes.name: keep-open
attributes.description: Determines whether the toast is closed automatically or not.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Determines whether the toast is opened.

properties.name: displayTime
properties.description: Determines the time after which the toast will close

properties.name: keepOpen
properties.description: Determines whether the toast is closed automatically or not.

cssParts.name: base
cssParts.description: The base wrapper of the toast.

tags.name: igc-tree-item
tags.description: The tree-item component represents a child item of the tree component or another tree item.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The tree item label.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: The tree item expansion state.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Marks the item as the tree's active item.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Get/Set whether the tree item is disabled. Disabled items are ignored for user interactions.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: The tree item selection state.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: To be used for load-on-demand scenarios in order to specify whether the item is loading data.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value entry that the tree item is visualizing. Required for searching through items.

properties.name: tree
properties.description: A reference to the tree the item is a part of.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent item of the current tree item (if any)

properties.name: level
properties.description: The depth of the item, relative to the root.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The tree item label.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: The tree item expansion state.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Marks the item as the tree's active item.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Get/Set whether the tree item is disabled. Disabled items are ignored for user interactions.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: The tree item selection state.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: To be used for load-on-demand scenarios in order to specify whether the item is loading data.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value entry that the tree item is visualizing. Required for searching through items.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The full path to the tree item, starting from the top-most ancestor.

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Renders the tree item loading indicator container.

slots.name: indentation
slots.description: Renders the container (by default the space) before the tree item.

cssParts.name: wrapper
cssParts.description: The wrapper for the tree item.

cssParts.name: active
cssParts.description: Indicates an active state. Applies to `wrapper`.

cssParts.name: indicator
cssParts.description: The expand indicator of the tree item.

cssParts.name: select
cssParts.description: The checkbox of the tree item when selection is enabled.

tags.name: igc-tree
tags.description:
The tree allows users to represent hierarchical data in a tree-view structure,
maintaining parent-child relationships, as well as to define static tree-view structure without a corresponding data model.

attributes.name: single-branch-expand
attributes.description: Whether a single or multiple of a parent's child items can be expanded.

attributes.name: selection
attributes.description: The selection state of the tree.

attributes.name: dir
attributes.description: The direction attribute of the control.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determines the size of the component.

properties.name: singleBranchExpand
properties.description: Whether a single or multiple of a parent's child items can be expanded.

properties.name: selection
properties.description: The selection state of the tree.

properties.name: dir
properties.description: The direction attribute of the control.

properties.name: items
properties.description: Returns all of the tree's items.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Determines the size of the component.

events.name: igcSelection
events.description: Emitted when item selection is changing, before the selection completes.

events.name: igcItemCollapsed
events.description: Emitted when tree item is collapsed.

events.name: igcItemCollapsing
events.description: Emitted when tree item is about to collapse.

events.name: igcItemExpanded
events.description: Emitted when tree item is expanded.

events.name: igcItemExpanding
events.description: Emitted when tree item is about to expand.

events.name: igcItemActivated
events.description: Emitted when the tree's `active` item changes.

slots.description: Renders the tree items inside default slot.
